title: Descending Surfacing
description: Lonely educator Emily commits an unforgivable sin.Tired of her conventional life, she decides to step into danger and excitement with student Jamie, the worst choice of lover. But their forbidden fling gets her into deep trouble: will the experience strengthen or destroy her?Written in Catherine Chisnall's characteristic understated and incisive prose, this story is a quiet masterpiece built around forbidden love and its consequences.
author: Lily Byrne
